item.title: [delta]epic new jail system and jury/trial system![delta]
item.dc:creator: @prison190 prison190
item.description:
@prison190 wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:30, topic:342054”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=438465.msg3361498#msg3361498 date=1286413669]

nice job but i keep getting this in compile maybe you can tell me how to fix it please?

client.java:9194: talk(java.lang.String,int) in client cannot be applied to (jav
a.lang.String)
talk(“All rise for the honorable judge Seth.”);
^
client.java:9198: talk(java.lang.String,int) in client cannot be applied to (jav
a.lang.String)
talk(“All rise for the honorable judge Nick.”);
^
client.java:9200: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable hween09
location: class client
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“jury”) && hween09 == 2) {
^
client.java:15277: talk(java.lang.String,int) in client cannot be applied to (ja
va.lang.String)
talk(“ALL JURY MEMBERS TO ::JURY AND NICK AND SETH GET YOUR ASS
TO COURT”);
^
client.java:15278: talk(java.lang.String,int) in client cannot be applied to (ja
va.lang.String)
talk(“ALL JURY MEMBERS TO ::JURY AND NICK AND SETH GET YOUR ASS
TO COURT”);
^
client.java:15279: talk(java.lang.String,int) in client cannot be applied to (ja
va.lang.String)
talk(“ALL JURY MEMBERS TO ::JURY AND NICK AND SETH GET YOUR ASS
TO COURT”);
^
client.java:15280: talk(java.lang.String,int) in client cannot be applied to (ja
va.lang.String)
talk(“Go and ill stop spamming!!! haha!!! gooooo!”);
^
client.java:15281: talk(java.lang.String,int) in client cannot be applied to (ja
va.lang.String)
talk(“TO WATCH THE TRIAL TYPE ::WATCHTRIAL”);
^
Note: SYIBlocker.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
8 errors
Press any key to continue . . .
[/quote]Nice gravedig.

It’s not a gravedig when the post is relevant.

@Prison[quote author=prison190 link=topic=438465.msg3362244#msg3362244 date=1286489374]
i am running a leeched server but i cannot tell if the client is half assed i know barley anything about coding. any ways i changed talk to yell those problems went away thanks but i still have problems with the server when i run the server i get this…

Chris's 317 is Online Welcome Back Chris Starting Web Server at 0.0.0.0:8080 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "2 642 2940 3278 0 0 0 0 0 2" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:458) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:499) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2113) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:547) at server.main(server.java:115)
[/quote]

Number format exception means you haven’t used the tabs key in which ever configuration file you were editing, so just delete the old tabbing and re-tab them, also tabs don’t show up correctly on MoparScape.[/quote]
ok thanks for the help so what does that mean i have to do? like i can log in but when i log in the game frame shows but thats it its just a black screen after that and it wont let me play so please tell me how to do that much appreciated thanks.

Read full topic

client.java:9194: talk(java.lang.String,int) in client cannot be applied to (jav
a.lang.String)

a.lang.String)

^
client.java:9200: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable hween09
location: class client
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“jury”) && hween09 == 2) {
^
client.java:15277: talk(java.lang.String,int) in client cannot be applied to (ja
va.lang.String)
talk(“ALL JURY MEMBERS TO ::JURY AND NICK AND SETH GET YOUR ASS
TO COURT”);
^
client.java:15278: talk(java.lang.String,int) in client cannot be applied to (ja
va.lang.String)

TO COURT”);

va.lang.String)

TO COURT”);

Press any key to continue . . .
[/quote]Nice gravedig.[/quote]

It’s not a gravedig when the post is relevant.

@Prison[quote=“prison190, post:29, topic:342054”]i am running a leeched server but i cannot tell if the client is half assed i know barley anything about coding. any ways i changed talk to yell those problems went away thanks but i still have problems with the server when i run the server i get this…

Chris's 317 is Online Welcome Back Chris Starting Web Server at 0.0.0.0:8080 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "2 642 2940 3278 0 0 0 0 0 2" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:458) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:499) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:2113) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:547) at server.main(server.java:115) [/quote]

Number format exception means you haven’t used the tabs key in which ever configuration file you were editing, so just delete the old tabbing and re-tab them, also tabs don’t show up correctly on MoparScape.
